svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Relative share of deaths in the United States
The relative share of deaths in the United States by cause. This represents each causes' share of the total 13
categories presented here only (which combined account for approximately 88% of total deaths in the United States).
Source: Shen et al. (2018). Based on the CDC WONDER public health database
